data.name: XMultiComponentFactory
desc: Factory interface for creating component instances giving a context from which to retrieve deployment values.

methods.name: createInstanceWithArgumentsAndContext
desc: Creates an instance of a component which supports the services specified by the factory, and initializes the new instance with the given arguments and context.

methods.name: createInstanceWithContext
desc: Creates an instance of a component which supports the services specified by the factory.

methods.name: getAvailableServiceNames
desc: Gets the names of all supported services.
